bike.description: High Modulus D-6 carbon w/ Integrated tapered head tube w/1 1/2" lower, Oversized 34.9mm round seat tube, PIIS BB-86 shell, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: High Modulus D-6 carbon seat stays, Oversized chain stay and Carbon drop out w/replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-330 Cross Carbon Monocoque w/Tapper steerer & carbon drop out

Shimano Dura Ace STI shifter/brake combo, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Oval W-945 Carbon Rim w/ Alloy Braking Surface, 58mm rim - 700c
Vittoria Cross XG Pro, 700x32c, Kevlar Bead-Folding
Avid Shorty 6 Forged Alloy Canti w/Swiss Stop Carbon Pads
FSA No. 42 CX 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L Integrated w/Carbon Top Cover
